pages.text: I finally have decided to nerf the damage distribution, so if you’re headshot by a skeleton, or any projectile for that matter, you most likely won’t instantly die like you did in the past. That being said, still prioritize your helmet! Use projectile protection instead of just protection! It can save your life sometimes.$(br2)Oh, you found diamonds? Make a helmet. If you’re going to
enchant your first piece of armor, do your helmet. Just protect your head at all costs. Other than that, protect your torso.
